title: Advertisement, "Restaurant Florent:  p-o-t-a-t-o", 1992
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: A smiling image of Dan Quayle's face, centered side to side, occupies three quarters of the page. Just underneath, the word p-o-t-a-t-o appears in large lowercase letters. Close to the bottom edge are two additional lines of type: Another message brought to you as a public service by Restaurant Florent and M&Co./ You can pck up voter registration forms 24 hours a day at Florent, 69 Gansevoort Street (989-5779).

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Restaurant Florent:  p-o-t-a-t-o", 1992.
1992. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-312.
